thread.title: Chris Cairns trial: Brendon McCullum arrives at court
thread.title_full: Chris Cairns trial: Brendon McCullum arrives at court

title: Chris Cairns trial: Brendon McCullum arrives at court
text: Brendon McCullum's greatest test as a cricketer is about to begin.The New Zealand captain is expected to start giving evidence in the Southwark Crown Court at... New Zealand Herald 7 hours ago - Sports LOU Vincent has arrived at court in London to give evidence against former New Zealand cricket team mate Chris Cairns at a perjury trial. Courier Mail 3 days ago - Australia Lou Vincent has arrived at court to give evidence against his former friend and idol Chris Cairns.Holding hands with his wife Susie Markham, Vincent walked... New Zealand Herald 3 days ago - Sports The court also heard that Chris Cairns had even attempted to recruit current New Zealand captain Brendon McCullum. Indian Express 1 week ago - Sports FORMER cricketer Chris Cairns allegedly promised now New Zealand captain Brendon McCullum huge sums of money to match-fix, a court has heard. Courier Mail 1 week ago - Sports CHRIS Cairns allegedly offered Brendon McCullum between $70,000 and $180,000 per game to match fix, a London court has been told.
